price: Na wakaondoka wakubwa wao wakiwaambia: Nendeni zenu na dumuni na miungu yenu, kwani hili ni jambo lililo pangwa.
arabic: وَٱنطَلَقَ ٱلۡمَلَأُ مِنۡهُمۡ أَنِ ٱمۡشُواْ وَٱصۡبِرُواْ عَلَىٰٓ ءَالِهَتِكُمۡۖ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَشَيۡءٞ يُرَادُ
footnotes: Wakubwa wao wakakimbilia kuusiana wao kwa wao wakiambiana: Endeleeni na njia yenu hiyo hiyo, na shikilieni kuiabudu miungu yenu. Kwani hakika tumepangiwa jambo kubwa hili.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-inṭalaqa al-mala-u min'hum ani im'shū wa-iṣ'birū ʿalā ālihatikum inna hādhā lashayon yurādu
